title: Foundations of Quantum Physics: Interactive Learning and Formative Assessment-Enhanced Course

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of high school physics (mechanics/electromagnetism) and foundational calculus
context.additional_context: Establishing multimodal learning environments using VR simulations and digital devices in laboratory settings

learning_goals: Students can visualize and explain quantum state superposition and entanglement phenomena using simulation tools.
Correction of over 80% of conceptual errors in quantum measurement problems through individual formative assessments.
Achievement of over 90% participation in interactive lectures and weekly quiz averages exceeding 75 points.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
